case.name: Operation Riptide Case
notes: Default Tier Odds Applied. Intra-Tier Item Odds Are Equal Per Project Rules.
Rare Special Items Are Spectrum Knife Types In Gamma Finishes; Gamma Doppler Outcomes Expanded Into Phase 1-4 And Emerald.
